segments.text: That stool, oh my goodness, that stool is going to tip!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the boy's weight shifting precariously on it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The legs are so splayed; it looks like a spider about to fall on its back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretched out so far, almost losing his balance as he grabs for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: My heart is pounding just watching him; I'm genuinely fearful for his safety.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He could really hurt himself if he falls from that height onto a hard floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And imagine landing on a wet floor too; it's a double hazard!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl below is completely oblivious to the danger, just focused on the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This entire situation fills me with a terrible sense of dread.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to warn them, but I'm just an observer.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to shout, 'Be careful!' at the top of my lungs.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's an agonizing wait for the inevitable.
segments.speaker: PAR
